function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of loan waivers and liquidity programs for loan buyers","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing loan waivers and liquidity programs to support loan buyers, reducing financial stress and avoiding the need for physical movement","Technologies":"Cloud-based medical analytics, mobile healthcare, IoT platform","People":"Loan buyers, general public","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffective outbreak role index (ORI) measurement leading to inadequate support and flexibility in healthcare","Impact":"Inadequate support and flexibility in healthcare, leading to difficulty in controlling disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing healthcare integrated with cloud-based medical analytics to measure ORI and provide better support and flexibility","Technologies":"Cloud-based medical analytics, IoT platform","People":"Healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring and detection of contagious diseases due to lack of technology for remote continuous patient monitoring","Impact":"Inadequate detection and monitoring of contagious diseases, leading to increased risk of outbreak","Mitigation":"Implementing remote continuous monitoring of patients using RFID, wearable sensor technology, and cloud computing infrastructure","Technologies":"RFID, wearable sensor technology, cloud computing","People":"Healthcare providers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
